data.name: Euro Truck Simulator 2 - Halloween Paint Jobs Pack
data.detailed_description:
Customize your truck with a choice of six dark and scary paint jobs! Halloween is a great time to be different and make your truck stand out against the usual serious business look of vehicles found on the roads today. But these spine-chilling paint schemes are in fact perfectly good for use all year round - if you are into it!

Paint schemes included:

  • Halloween Pumpkin
  • Crying Wolf
  • Fallen Angel
  • Spider Web
  • Flaming Dragon
  • Grim Reaper

New Paint schemes also Included:

  • Paranormal Activity
  • Malevolent Moon

All of these themes are applicable to any in-game truck except for 8x4 chassis configurations.

Bonus content!

  • Bobblehead Pumpkin
  • Evil Bat

data.supported_languages: English, German, French, Italian, Korean, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Japanese, Portuguese, Polish, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Norwegian, Swedish, Hungarian, Czech, Romanian, Turkish, Portuguese - Brazil, Bulgarian, Greek

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class
  • DirectX®: 10
  • Hard Drive: 40 MB available space
  • Sound: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class
  • DirectX®: 10
  • Hard Drive: 40 MB available space
  • Sound: DirectX compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.8+ (Mountain Lion)
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GT-class equivalent
  • Hard Drive: 40 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.8+ (Mountain Lion)
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class or better
  • Hard Drive: 40 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class
  • recent binary ATI or NVidia drivers (MESA may not work reliably with ETS2)
  • Hard Drive: 40 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 760-class
  • recent binary ATI or NVidia drivers (MESA may not work reliably with ETS2)
  • Hard Drive: 40 MB available space
